jobDescription: Title: Research Intern  FUJITSU LABORATORIES OF AMERICA, INC. (FLA) was established in 1993 as a wholly owned subsidiary of Fujitsu Laboratories Ltd., which is a wholly owned subsidiary of Fujitsu Ltd., focusing on contributing to Fujitsu's technology value chain. FLA conducts advanced research in Device, Component, and Platform Innovations, Network and Trusted Systems Innovations, and Internet Service Innovations. FLA also conducts research in an open and networked laboratory environment, and contributes to Fujitsu global business through developing and expanding leading edge technologies, promoting the creation of new businesses, and the creation of global value chain while fulfilling its social responsibilities. FLA contributes to the world of research communities through joint research projects with universities and research organizations, and through the free exchange of ideas at technical conferences.  Job Description for Internship at Cyber-Physical System Lab  The candidate will work on one or more of the following tasks. Design and implementation of Open API related platforms using natural language processing and data miningAdvanced algorithm design and implementation (e.g. machine learning) to improve the performance of the platform The candidate must be a Master or PhD student (PhD preferred) in computer science, EE or similar field. He or she should be proficient in Python and C/C (or Java). Moreover, the candidate should have enough experience in natural language processing (NLP), machine learning (ML) and data mining, and familiar with the open source tools related to NLP and ML. In addition, knowledge and project experience related to Open API and/or distributed systems are preferred.SDL2017
